text: Monica Potter (born June 30, 1971) is an American actress. She works in both movies and television programs. She played Alison Gordon in the 2004 movie Saw, Tricia Poe in the thriller movie Con Air and Kristina Braverman in the television show Parenthood. She also played Lori Colson in Boston Legal. She was born in Cleveland, Ohio. title: Monica Potter
